system.description: Your connection to the Motive Force allows you to channel electrical energy directly into machines and devices, charging depleted power cells and reviving dormant systems.
system.benefit:
You can take one minute to charge various machines and devices, making a Toughness Test dependent on the scale:

  • +10: Power Cell, Illuminator
  • +0: Weapon Charge Pack, Data Slate, Bridge Terminal
  • -10: Hotshot Charge Pack, Shuttle Electronics, Servo Skull
  • -20: Lascannon Charge Pack, Servitor, Bridge Hololith
  • -30: Ship Cogitator Core, Reactor Machine Spirit, Xenos Technology

GM judges viability. Afterwards, you must pass a Toughness Test or gain a level of Fatigue.

rollConfig.description: Toughness Test to channel energy (modifier varies by device scale)

specialAbilities.name: Charge Device
specialAbilities.description: Take one minute and make a Toughness Test to charge a device. The modifier depends on scale: +10 (small), +0 (medium), -10 (large), -20 (huge), -30 (massive/complex). After charging, make another Toughness Test or gain 1 Fatigue.
